AirBnbModel.preprocess package¶

Submodules¶

AirBnbModel.preprocess.run module¶

Contains the functions that define the execution of the ‘preprocess’ task, which is responsible of loading data extracted by ‘source’ task, preprocessing it and saved into a new folder, so it can be fed into a ML model.

Functions on this script must be called from run.py on main package folder.

Configuration parameters for this task can be found on configs/config.yml

AirBnbModel.preprocess.run.predict()¶

Defines the execution of the ‘preprocess’ task on predict mode.

This task loads new data from staging database, combines, generates new features and uses the parameters fitted on train_eval execution of the task, to input missing values over the data.

AirBnbModel.preprocess.run.train_eval()¶

Defines the execution of the ‘preprocess’ task on train_eval mode.

This task loads training data from staging database, combines, generates new features and fits different preprocessing parameters, in order to input missing values.

Module contents¶

Module that runs the neccesary scripts to load different files from the staging database, preprocesses it and saves it into a new folder, so it can be fed into a ML model.

This module is part of the AirBnbModel package. For further information on the package, type:

>> help(AirBnbModel)
